reviewText: It is a slideshow Which for the wrong person could be boring But for the right person, the information given is absolutely intriguing. How the discovery came about, their writings about their society, how they live their religion and how how their civilization ended is all very interesting The city of Elba, which is also talked about is remarkable. This city traded with Sodom and Gomorrah!!! And they found thousands of clay tablets, which would give us an unbelievable amount of information clear back to 3000 BC. And yet Syria closed it down for political reasons and there it sits waiting!!!
